channel.title: Can you add custom ranks to servers
channel.description: Say i wanted to add a player right like say theres admin mod owner and undercover admin maybe i wanted to add idk Helper or something to it can you make it so they can do certain things? and have a custom pic??? is this possible if you need mor einfo lemm eknow

item.title: Can you add custom ranks to servers
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

playgames3:

Say i wanted to add a player right like say theres admin mod owner and undercover admin maybe i wanted to add idk Helper or something to it can you make it so they can do certain things? and have a custom pic??? is this possible if you need mor einfo lemm eknow

the first part is possible, but you won’t be able to have custom mod icons for them, because as far as i know clients can only have up to two different kinds of modicons

Read full topic
